title: hirushaa
author: hirushaa
content: Shahram Zandy Moghadam, also known as Lord Alex, is a British-Iranian entrepreneur who was born in Iran in 1965 and has been residing in the UK since the age of 10. He studied IT & Business and has always been a quiet entrepreneur, preferring to work behind the scenes on most of his projects.In 2011, Shahram sold his house and invested the entire amount into Bitcoin, which led him to become involved in the Blockchain scene. In 2016, he invested as a backbencher in a blockchain project with Bulgarian and Chinese PHD partners, resulting in the creation of the successful Bitcoin Gold platform. At its peak, Bitcoin Gold reached $498.Since the Covid pandemic in 2019, Shahram has been on the lookout for groundbreaking ideas that can revolutionize the industry. His search led him to create BITXGOLD, a fully gold-backed cryptocurrency that serves as a hedge in the stock markets and a safe investment for ordinary people.Currently, Shahram is the CEO of acetek.solutions, a blockchain development company based in Dubai. Additionally, his company, Ace Stock Commercial Brokers CO.LLC, is based in Dubai and is expanding BITXGOLD into the South Asian markets of Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, Brunei, and Cambodia.A search for "Shahram Zandy Moghadam" on Google will yield information on his successful entrepreneurship ventures, including the creation of Bitcoin Gold and the launch of BITXGOLD.I'm Serching more informations about him, If you can find something bout him, reply here...Stay Tuned for more informations ............
